chrome_windows

Top-Level Variables
windows: ChromeWindows
Classes
ChromeWindows

Use the chrome.windows API to interact with browser windows. You can use this API to create, modify, and rearrange windows in the browser.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeWindows windows

Class ChromeWindows

Fields
WINDOW_ID_CURRENT: dynamic
WINDOW_ID_NONE: dynamic
onCreated: Stream
onFocusChanged: Stream
onRemoved: Stream
Getters and Setters
WINDOW_ID_CURRENT: dynamic
WINDOW_ID_NONE: dynamic
onCreated: Stream<dynamic>
onFocusChanged: Stream<dynamic>
onRemoved: Stream<dynamic>
Methods
create(dynamic createData, dynamic callback): void
get(int windowId, dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback): void
getAll(dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback): void
getCurrent(dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback): void
getLastFocused(dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback): void
remove(int windowId, dynamic callback): void
update(int windowId, dynamic updateInfo, dynamic callback): void

Fields

final dynamic WINDOW_ID_CURRENT
final dynamic WINDOW_ID_NONE
final Stream onCreated
final Stream onFocusChanged
final Stream onRemoved

Getters and Setters

dynamic get WINDOW_ID_CURRENT

The windowId value that represents the [current window](windows.html#current-window).

dynamic get WINDOW_ID_NONE

The windowId value that represents the absence of a chrome browser window.

Stream<dynamic> get onCreated

Fired when a window is created.

Stream<dynamic> get onFocusChanged

Fired when the currently focused window changes. Will be chrome.windows.WINDOW_ID_NONE if all chrome windows have lost focus. Note: On some Linux window managers, WINDOW_ID_NONE will always be sent immediately preceding a switch from one chrome window to another.

Stream<dynamic> get onRemoved

Fired when a window is removed (closed).

Methods

void create(dynamic createData, dynamic callback)

Creates (opens) a new browser with any optional sizing, position or default URL provided.

void get(int windowId, dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback)

Gets details about a window.

getInfo

void getAll(dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback)

Gets all windows.

getInfo

void getCurrent(dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback)

Gets the current window(#current-window).

getInfo

void getLastFocused(dynamic getInfo, dynamic callback)

Gets the window that was most recently focused - typically the window 'on top'.

getInfo

void remove(int windowId, dynamic callback)

Removes (closes) a window, and all the tabs inside it.

void update(int windowId, dynamic updateInfo, dynamic callback)

Updates the properties of a window. Specify only the properties that you want to change; unspecified properties will be left unchanged.
